song.englishname: I Know That My Redeemer Liveth

english.segment1: I know that my Redeemer liveth. And that He shall stand. At the latter day. Upon the earth
english.segment2: I know that my Redeemer liveth. And He shall stand. At the latter day. Upon the earth. Upon the earth
english.segment3: I know that my Redeemer liveth. And that He shall stand. At the latter day. Upon the earth
english.segment4: And though worms destroy this body. Yet in my flesh shall I see God. Yet in my flesh shall I see God
english.segment5: For now is Christ risen. From the dead. The first fruits of them that sleep. For now is Christ risen. For now is Christ risen. From the dead
english.segment6: I know that my Redeemer liveth. I know that my Redeemer lives. I know that Christ is risen. Yes, I know my Redeemer lives.
